QuestData.Title: The Secret of the Fungus
QuestData.Description: I'm beginning to sense a strong... connection... between the fungus and the creatures that inhabit it. There are certain mushrooms that are stronger than others.$b$bI believe if I had some samples of these I could use them, track the source of this foul fungus and... deal with it.
QuestData.RewardText: Sadly, I'm growing used to the smell of these spores. In fact, they smell quite pleasant now. Perhaps if I eat these it will speed up our work here...
